CustomField.description: Data received from NICE CXOne. Format of this field Owner Id + "-" + Related To Id. We parse data from this field and set OwnerId and WhatId respectively.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Data received from NICE CXOne. Format of this field Owner Id + "-" + Related To Id. We parse data from this field and set OwnerId and WhatId respectively.
CustomField.label: Owner Related To ID (NICE)
